summary: For those who played Twilight Princess, will recognize this grand buster sword wielded by darknuts.
descriptionHtml:
For those who played Twilight Princess, will recognize this grand buster sword wielded by darknuts.
The blade\'s recipe is one ingot of steel, 5 of ebony, and 3 leather strips, along with an Ebony smithing perk.
Note that this will be implemented in a much bigger mod to come.


Original concept by Nintendo
Model and texture by Overmind5000
author: Overmind5000
